comments:
I20050330

* Installed JREs
* Select a JRE & Edit
* De-select "use default system libraries"
* Select a source attachment & Edit
* make the attachment empty & OK
> the source attachement shows as "none"

* Press OK to dismiss the edit dialog
* Press OK to dismess the prefs dialog
* Re-open the pref page, select the JRE and Edit
> the source attachment has been restored to the original state (i.e. is no 
longer "none")

apparently the same cause as 83549 - the Preferences window forgets the Source 
setting.

An NPE is being hidden:

Fixed in VMLibraryBlock. We were using null instead of Path.EMPTY for source 
attachments.
